title: ОМ Олега Меньшикова
overview: To acquaint the viewer with famous heroes of our time from an unknown side is what interests me. Our format is not a monologue or an interview, it is an equivalent dialogue. I open the OM channel with the confidence that we come out with an up-to-date, honest and sincere product. In our hasty time, suddenly take it and do not hurry.OM.
